# VEHICLE::SET_DISTANT_CARS_ENABLED

## Summary
Turns distant cars on/off

## Parameters
* **BOOL** enable

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Toggles to render distant vehicles. They may not be vehicles but images to look like vehicles.
